minor request that updating the seconds field also updates the yy;dd:hh:mm:ss fields. Makes it easier to tweak things since when you paste a seconds value (I do this from KSPTOT Mission Architect) it also sets the alarm for exactly that time, and maybe you want to back off a few minutes or whatever. Alternatively I could just use KSPTOT to adjust the seconds value prior to pasting it in KAC, but on the other hand I'd like to keep the KSPTOT value unchanged in case I want to revert or otherwise modify it from its original value

Second, while I love the new "Warp To" function, I get very nervous using warps higher than 100x. Would it be possible to put in a max allowable warp setting?

Use Kerbal Alarm Clock for a few more days. Every time a higher time warp screws something up, go into the settings and make an auto-alarm for that thing.

Your nervousness will soon end and you'll instead find yourself banging on the ">" key with fervor.
